Males with this condition produce sperm that have decreased movement (motility), causing affected males to be infertile.",GHR,sensorineural deafness and male infertility
How many people are affected by sensorineural deafness and male infertility ?,The prevalence of sensorineural deafness and male infertility is unknown.,GHR,sensori
